passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(7) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > h5:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(10) > div:nth-child(1) > main:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(10) > div:nth-child(1) > main:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(7) > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(10) > footer:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > h2
html > body > div:nth-child(10) > footer:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > h2
